mapper.select: SELECT ART_GROUP_NO , ART_GROUP_NM , ART_GROUP_CONTENT , ART_GROUP_DEBUTDATE , ART_GROUP_PROFILE_IMG , ART_GROUP_DEL_YN FROM ARTIST_GROUP WHERE ART_GROUP_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY ART_GROUP_NO DESC

SELECT AG.ART_GROUP_NO , AG.ART_GROUP_TYPE_CODE , AG.EMP_USERNAME , AG.ART_GROUP_DEBUTDATE , AG.ART_GROUP_NM , AG.ART_GROUP_CONTENT , AG.ART_GROUP_REG_DATE , AG.ART_GROUP_DEL_YN , AG.ART_GROUP_PROFILE_IMG , AG.ART_GROUP_MOD_DATE
, AT.ART_NO , AT.MEM_USERNAME , AT.ART_NM , AT.ART_CONTENT , AT.ART_REG_DATE , AT.ART_MOD_DATE , AT.ART_PROFILE_IMG , AT.ART_DEBUTDATE , AT.ART_DEL_YN
, AGM.ART_GROUP_MAP_DEBUTDATE , AGM.ART_DEL_YN FROM ARTIST_GROUP AG LEFT JOIN ARTIST_GROUP_MAP AGM ON AG.ART_GROUP_NO = AGM.ART_GROUP_NO LEFT JOIN ARTIST AT ON AGM.ART_NO = AT.ART_NO WHERE AG.ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} AND AG.ART_GROUP_DEL_YN = 'N' AND AGM.ART_DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY AG.ART_GROUP_NO DESC

SELECT A.ALBUM_NO , A.ART_GROUP_NO , A.ALBUM_IMG , A.ALBUM_NM , A.ALBUM_DETAIL , A.ALBUM_REG_DATE
, B.SONG_NO , B.ALBUM_NO , B.SONG_NM , B.SONG_TITLE_YN FROM ARTIST_ALBUM A LEFT JOIN ALBUM_SONG B ON A.ALBUM_NO = B.ALBUM_NO WHERE A.ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} ORDER BY A.ALBUM_REG_DATE DESC
mapper.sql: cp.comu_post_no , cp.board_type_code , cp.comu_profile_no , cp.art_group_no , cp.file_group_no , cp.comu_post_stat_code , cp.comu_post_content , cp.comu_post_reg_date , cp.comu_post_mod_date , cp.comu_post_mbsp_yn , cp.comu_post_del_yn

, cpro.comu_profile_no as writer_profile_no , cpro.art_group_no as writer_art_group_no , cpro.mem_username as writer_mem_username , cpro.comu_mem_cat_code as writer_mem_cat_code , cpro.comu_profile_img as writer_comu_profile_img , cpro.comu_nicknm as writer_comu_nicknm , cpro.comu_reg_date as writer_comu_reg_date , cpro.comu_del_yn as writer_comu_del_yn
, bt.board_type_code as bt_board_type_code , bt.board_nm as bt_board_nm , bt.board_reg_date as bt_board_reg_date , bt.board_reply_yn as bt_board_reply_yn

, cr.comu_reply_no as reply_comu_reply_no , cr.comu_post_no as reply_comu_post_no , cr.board_type_code as reply_board_type_code , cr.comu_profile_no as reply_comu_profile_no , cr.comu_reply_content as reply_comu_reply_content , cr.comu_reply_reg_date as reply_comu_reply_reg_date , cr.comu_reply_mod_date as reply_comu_reply_mod_date , cr.comu_reply_del_yn as reply_comu_reply_del_yn , cr.art_group_no as reply_art_group_no

, recpro.comu_profile_no as reply_writer_profile_no , recpro.art_group_no as reply_writer_art_group_no , recpro.mem_username as reply_writer_mem_username , recpro.comu_mem_cat_code as reply_writer_mem_cat_code , recpro.comu_profile_img as reply_writer_profile , recpro.comu_nicknm as reply_writer_nicknm , recpro.comu_reg_date as reply_writer_reg_date , recpro.comu_del_yn as reply_writer_del_yn

LEFT outer JOIN community_reply cr ON a.comu_post_no = cr.comu_post_no and cr.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N' left outer join community_profile recpro on cr.comu_profile_no = recpro.comu_profile_no where a.rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
mapper.select:
select * from( select a.*
from( select
, COALESCE(cl_count.like_count, 0) AS comu_post_like_count
, COALESCE(rc.reply_count, 0) AS comu_post_reply_count
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cp.comu_post_reg_date DESC, cp.comu_post_no DESC) AS rn
, nvl2(lk.yn , 'Y', 'N') as like_yn
order by cp.comu_post_reg_date desc ) a
order by cr.COMU_REPLY_NO desc, cr.COMU_REPLY_REG_DATE)b order by b.comu_post_reg_date desc

select * from( select a.*,
from( select
, COALESCE(cl_count.like_count, 0) AS comu_post_like_count
, COALESCE(rc.reply_count, 0) AS comu_post_reply_count
, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY cp.comu_post_no DESC, cp.comu_post_reg_date DESC) AS rn
and cp.board_type_code = 'Fan_BOARD' order by cp.comu_post_no desc, cp.comu_post_reg_date desc ) a
order by cr.COMU_REPLY_NO desc, cr.COMU_REPLY_REG_DATE)

select count(*) from community_post cp left outer join community_profile cpro on cp.comu_profile_no = cpro.comu_profile_no where cp.art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and cp.board_type_code = 'ARTIST_BOARD' and cp.comu_post_del_yn = 'N'
and cp.comu_post_content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'
and cpro.mem_username like '%'||#{searchType}||'%'

select count(*) from community_post cp left outer join community_profile cpro on cp.comu_profile_no = cpro.comu_profile_no where cp.art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and cp.board_type_code = 'FAN_BOARD' and cp.comu_post_del_yn = 'N'
and cp.comu_post_content like '%'||#{searchWord}||'%'

select comu_profile_no , art_group_no , mem_username , comu_mem_cat_code , comu_profile_img , comu_nicknm , comu_reg_date , comu_del_yn from community_profile where art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and mem_username = #{memUsername} and comu_del_yn = 'N'

select comu_profile_no , art_group_no , mem_username , comu_mem_cat_code , comu_profile_img , comu_nicknm , comu_reg_date , comu_del_yn from community_profile where art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and mem_username = #{memUsername} and comu_del_yn = 'N'

select cp.comu_post_no , cp.board_type_code , cp.comu_profile_no , cp.art_group_no , cp.file_group_no , cp.comu_post_stat_code , cp.comu_post_content , cp.comu_post_reg_date , cp.comu_post_mod_date , cp.comu_post_mbsp_yn , cp.comu_post_del_yn
, cpro.comu_profile_no as writer_profile_no , cpro.art_group_no as writer_art_group_no , cpro.mem_username as writer_mem_username , cpro.comu_mem_cat_code as writer_mem_cat_code , cpro.comu_profile_img as writer_comu_profile_img , cpro.comu_nicknm as writer_comu_nicknm , cpro.comu_reg_date as writer_comu_reg_date , cpro.comu_del_yn as writer_comu_del_yn
, bt.board_type_code as bt_board_type_code , bt.board_nm as bt_board_nm , bt.board_reg_date as bt_board_reg_date , bt.board_reply_yn as bt_board_reply_yn
, cr.comu_reply_no as reply_comu_reply_no , cr.comu_post_no as reply_comu_post_no , cr.board_type_code as reply_board_type_code , cr.comu_profile_no as reply_comu_profile_no , cr.comu_reply_content as reply_comu_reply_content , cr.comu_reply_reg_date as reply_comu_reply_reg_date , cr.comu_reply_mod_date as reply_comu_reply_mod_date , cr.comu_reply_del_yn as reply_comu_reply_del_yn , cr.art_group_no as reply_art_group_no
, recpro.comu_profile_no as reply_writer_profile_no , recpro.art_group_no as reply_writer_art_group_no , recpro.mem_username as reply_writer_mem_username , recpro.comu_mem_cat_code as reply_writer_mem_cat_code , recpro.comu_profile_img as reply_writer_profile , recpro.comu_nicknm as reply_writer_nicknm , recpro.comu_reg_date as reply_writer_reg_date , recpro.comu_del_yn as reply_writer_del_yn
, COALESCE(cl_count.like_count, 0) AS comu_post_like_count
, COALESCE(rc.reply_count, 0) AS comu_post_reply_count
, nvl2(lk.yn , 'Y', 'N') as like_yn
from community_post cp left outer JOIN community_profile cpro ON cp.comu_profile_no = cpro.comu_profile_no LEFT outer JOIN board_type bt ON cp.board_type_code = bt.board_type_code LEFT outer JOIN community_reply cr ON cp.comu_post_no = cr.comu_post_no and cr.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N' left outer join community_profile recpro on cr.comu_profile_no = recpro.comu_profile_no LEFT outer JOIN (SELECT comu_post_no, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM community_like GROUP BY comu_post_no) cl_count ON cp.comu_post_no = cl_count.comu_post_no left outer join (select COMU_POST_NO, count(comu_reply_no) as reply_count from community_reply group by COMU_POST_NO, COMU_REPLY_DEL_YN having COMU_REPLY_DEL_YN = 'N') rc on cp.comu_post_no = rc.comu_post_no left outer join (select cc.comu_like_no as yn, cc.comu_post_no from community_like cc where cc.comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo}) lk on cp.comu_post_no = lk.comu_post_no where cp.comu_post_no = #{comuPostNo}
order by cr.comu_reply_reg_date desc

SELECT comu_post_no , board_type_code , comu_profile_no , art_group_no , file_group_no , comu_post_stat_code , comu_post_content , comu_post_reg_date , comu_post_mod_date , comu_post_mbsp_yn , comu_post_del_yn FROM community_post where comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo} and art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and comu_post_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT comu_reply_no , comu_post_no , board_type_code , comu_profile_no , comu_reply_content , comu_reply_reg_date , comu_reply_mod_date , comu_reply_del_yn , art_group_no FROM community_reply where comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo} and art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and comu_reply_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT cprofile.comu_profile_no , cprofile.art_group_no , cprofile.mem_username , cprofile.comu_mem_cat_code , cprofile.comu_profile_img , cprofile.comu_nicknm , cprofile.comu_reg_date , cprofile.comu_del_yn , cpost.comu_post_no , cpost.board_type_code , cpost.comu_profile_no as post_COMU_PROFILE_NO , cpost.art_group_no as post_ART_GROUP_NO , cpost.file_group_no , cpost.comu_post_stat_code , cpost.comu_post_content , cpost.comu_post_reg_date , cpost.comu_post_mod_date , cpost.comu_post_mbsp_yn , cpost.comu_post_del_yn
, (select case when (select count(*) from community_like lk where lk.comu_post_no = cpost.comu_post_no and comu_profile_no = #{myComuProfileNo}) = 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end from dual ) as comu_post_like_yn
, creply.comu_reply_no , creply.comu_post_no as reply_COMU_POST_NO , creply.board_type_code as reply_BOARD_TYPE_CODE , creply.comu_profile_no as reply_COMU_PROFILE_NO , creply.comu_reply_content , creply.comu_reply_reg_date , creply.comu_reply_mod_date , creply.comu_reply_del_yn , creply.art_group_no as reply_art_group_no , (select comu_post_content from community_post comupost where comupost.comu_post_no = creply.comu_post_no) as reply_comu_post_content , (select count(*) from community_like cl where cpost.comu_post_no = cl.comu_post_no) as comu_post_like_cnt , (select count(*) from community_reply cr where cpost.comu_post_no = cr.comu_post_no and cr.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N') as comu_post_reply_cnt , wprofile.comu_profile_no as writer_comu_profile_no , wprofile.comu_profile_img as writer_comu_profile_img , wprofile.comu_nicknm as writer_comu_nicknm , wprofile.comu_del_yn as writer_comu_del_yn , afd.attach_detail_no , afd.file_group_no as detail_file_group_no , afd.file_original_nm , afd.file_save_nm , afd.file_savepath , afd.file_ext , afd.file_mime_type , afd.file_fancysize , afd.file_save_date FROM community_profile cprofile LEFT OUTER JOIN community_post cpost on (cprofile.comu_profile_no = cpost.comu_profile_no) LEFT OUTER JOIN community_reply creply on (cprofile.comu_profile_no = creply.comu_profile_no) left join community_post wpost on (creply.comu_post_no = wpost.comu_post_no) left join community_profile wprofile on (wpost.comu_profile_no = wprofile.comu_profile_no) left join attachment_file_detail afd on (cpost.file_group_no = afd.file_group_no) WHERE cprofile.comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo} and cprofile.art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and cprofile.comu_del_yn = 'N' and (cpost.comu_post_del_yn = 'N' or cpost.comu_post_del_yn is null) and (creply.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N' or creply.comu_reply_del_yn is null) order by cpost.comu_post_no desc, creply.comu_reply_reg_date desc

SELECT cpost.comu_post_no , cpost.board_type_code , cpost.comu_profile_no as post_COMU_PROFILE_NO , cpost.art_group_no as post_ART_GROUP_NO , cpost.file_group_no , cpost.comu_post_stat_code , cpost.comu_post_content , cpost.comu_post_reg_date , cpost.comu_post_mod_date , cpost.comu_post_mbsp_yn , cpost.comu_post_del_yn , (select count(*) from community_like clike where clike.comu_post_no = cpost.comu_post_no ) as comu_post_like_cnt , creply.comu_reply_no , creply.comu_post_no as reply_COMU_POST_NO , creply.board_type_code as reply_BOARD_TYPE_CODE , creply.comu_profile_no as reply_COMU_PROFILE_NO , creply.comu_reply_content , creply.comu_reply_reg_date , creply.comu_reply_mod_date , creply.comu_reply_del_yn , (select count(*) from community_reply core where core.comu_post_no = cpost.comu_post_no and core.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N') as comu_post_reply_cnt , creply.art_group_no as reply_art_group_no , cprofile.comu_profile_no , cprofile.art_group_no , cprofile.mem_username , cprofile.comu_mem_cat_code , cprofile.comu_profile_img , cprofile.comu_nicknm , cprofile.comu_reg_date , cprofile.comu_del_yn , crp.comu_profile_no as reply_comu_profile_no , crp.art_group_no as reply_art_group_no , crp.mem_username as reply_mem_username , crp.comu_mem_cat_code as reply_comu_mem_cat_code , crp.comu_profile_img as reply_comu_profile_img , crp.comu_nicknm as reply_comu_nicknm , crp.comu_reg_date as reply_comu_reg_date , crp.comu_del_yn as reply_comu_del_yn , (select case when (select count(*) from community_like lk where lk.comu_post_no = #{comuPostNo} and comu_profile_no = #{myComuProfileNo}) = 1 then 'Y' else 'N' end from dual ) as comu_post_like_yn , afd.attach_detail_no , afd.file_group_no as detail_file_group_no , afd.file_original_nm , afd.file_save_nm , afd.file_savepath , afd.file_ext , afd.file_mime_type , afd.file_fancysize , afd.file_save_date FROM community_post cpost left outer join community_reply creply on (cpost.comu_post_no = creply.comu_post_no) left join community_profile cprofile on (cpost.comu_profile_no = cprofile.comu_profile_no) left outer join community_profile crp on (creply.comu_profile_no = crp.comu_profile_no) left join attachment_file_detail afd on (cpost.file_group_no = afd.file_group_no) where cpost.comu_post_no = #{comuPostNo} and (creply.comu_reply_del_yn = 'N' or creply.comu_reply_del_yn is null) order by cpost.comu_post_no desc, creply.comu_reply_reg_date desc

SELECT cpost.comu_post_no , cpost.board_type_code , cpost.comu_profile_no as post_COMU_PROFILE_NO , cpost.art_group_no as post_ART_GROUP_NO , cpost.file_group_no , cpost.comu_post_stat_code , cpost.comu_post_content , cpost.comu_post_reg_date , cpost.comu_post_mod_date , cpost.comu_post_mbsp_yn , cpost.comu_post_del_yn , afd.attach_detail_no , afd.file_group_no as detail_file_group_no , afd.file_original_nm , afd.file_save_nm , afd.file_savepath , afd.file_ext , afd.file_mime_type , afd.file_fancysize , afd.file_save_date FROM community_post cpost left join attachment_file_detail afd on (cpost.file_group_no = afd.file_group_no) where cpost.comu_post_no = #{comuPostNo}
select comu_profile_no from community_profile where art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and mem_username = #{memUsername} and comu_del_yn = 'N'
select count(COMU_REPLY_NO) from community_reply where COMU_POST_NO = #{comuPostNo} and COMU_REPLY_DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.update: update community_reply set comu_reply_del_yn = 'Y' where comu_reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.insert:
select community_like_seq.nextval from dual
insert into community_like( comu_like_no , comu_post_no , board_type_code , comu_profile_no , art_group_no , comu_like_reg_date) values( #{comuLikeNo}, #{comuPostNo}, #{boardTypeCode}, #{comuProfileNo}, #{artGroupNo}, systimestamp )
mapper.select: select comu_like_no , comu_post_no , board_type_code , comu_profile_no , art_group_no , comu_like_reg_date from community_like where comu_post_no = #{comuPostNo} and comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo}
SELECT comm_code_det_no , comm_code_grp_no , comm_code_det_nm , use_yn , description FROM common_detail_code where 1=1
mapper.insert:
select reports_detail_seq.nextval from dual
insert into reports_detail ( report_det_no , report_no) values ( #{reportDetNo} , #{reportNo})
mapper.select: select attachment_file_seq.nextval from dual

select nvl2( (select report_no from reports where MEM_USERNAME = #{memUsername}
),'Y','N') AS reportYn FROM DUAL

SELECT L.LIVE_NO, L.LIVE_TITLE, L.LIVE_CONTENT, L.LIVE_THMIMG_URL, L.LIVE_HIT, L.LIVE_URL AS "id", C.ART_GROUP_NO, AG.ART_GROUP_NM FROM LIVE L INNER JOIN CHAT_CHANNELS C ON (L.CHAT_CHANNEL_NO = C.CHAT_CHANNEL_NO) LEFT JOIN ARTIST_GROUP AG ON (C.ART_GROUP_NO = AG.ART_GROUP_NO) WHERE C.ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} AND L.LIVE_STATUS = 'LS001'

SELECT comu_profile_no , art_group_no , mem_username , comu_mem_cat_code , comu_profile_img , comu_nicknm , comu_reg_date , comu_del_yn FROM community_profile WHERE comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo} AND comu_del_yn = 'N'
SELECT mem_username FROM community_profile WHERE comu_profile_no = #{comuProfileNo} AND comu_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT CASE WHEN count(ms.mbsp_no) > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS has_active_subscription FROM membership_description md LEFT JOIN membership_subscriptions ms ON md.mbsp_no = ms.mbsp_no AND ms.mem_username = #{memUsername} -- (1) 조인 조건으로 이동 WHERE md.art_group_no = #{artGroupNo} and ms.MBSP_SUB_STAT_CODE = 'MSSC001'
SELECT GOODS_NO FROM GOODS WHERE ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} AND GOODS_STAT_CODE = 'GSC001' AND GOODS_DIV_CODE = 'GDC002'

select count(*) from membership_subscriptions ms left join membership_description md on (ms.mbsp_no = md.mbsp_no) where ms.mem_username = #{memUsername} and md.art_group_no = #{artGroupNo}
and systimestamp <= ms.mbsp_sub_end_date

SELECT L.LIVE_NO, L.LIVE_TITLE, L.LIVE_CONTENT, L.LIVE_HIT, L.LIVE_QTY, L.LIVE_START_DATE, L.LIVE_END_DATE, C.ART_GROUP_NO FROM LIVE L JOIN CHAT_CHANNELS C ON L.CHAT_CHANNEL_NO = C.CHAT_CHANNEL_NO WHERE C.ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} ORDER BY L.LIVE_START_DATE DESC
select COUNT(*) FROM COMMUNITY_PROFILE WHERE ART_GROUP_NO = #{artGroupNo} AND COMU_MEM_CAT_CODE IN ('CMCC001', 'CMCC002') AND COMU_DEL_YN = 'N'
select art_no , mem_username , art_nm , art_content , art_reg_date , art_mod_date , art_profile_img , art_debutdate , art_del_yn from artist

select b.worldArtNo , b.cnt , b.cntDenseRank , b.art_no , b.mem_username , b.art_nm , b.art_content , b.art_reg_date , b.art_mod_date , b.art_profile_img , b.art_debutdate , b.art_del_yn from( select a.art_no as worldArtNo , a.cnt , dense_rank() over(order by cnt desc) as cntDenseRank , ar.ART_NO , MEM_USERNAME , ART_NM , ART_CONTENT , ART_REG_DATE , ART_MOD_DATE , ART_PROFILE_IMG , ART_DEBUTDATE , ART_DEL_YN from( select art_no, count(art_no) as cnt from worldcup_votes group by art_no) a left join artist ar on a.art_no = ar.art_no ) b
where b.cntDenseRank <=3
